widgets.title: Cloud Accounts
widgets.text: Securely manage, access, and synchronize your digital assets with ease through our comprehensive cloud accounts platform.

widgets.title: Cloud Accounts Risk Management
widgets.text: Effectively identify, assess, and mitigate risks in cloud accounts to ensure robust security and compliance.

widgets.title: Workload Alerts
widgets.text: Receive real-time workload alerts to monitor performance and prevent potential bottlenecks before they impact your operations.

widgets.title: Image Risk Assessment
widgets.text: Conduct thorough image risk assessments to identify vulnerabilities and ensure the security of your visual assets.

widgets.title: Image Security Issues
widgets.text: Address and resolve image security issues to protect your visual assets from unauthorized access and potential breaches.

widgets.title: Ticket Count
widgets.text: Keep track of your support efficiency with real-time ticket count monitoring.
